alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips County through 500 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Dodson, or 15 miles northwest of Malta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Loring, Chapman, Bowdoin and Sleeping Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
